title: Video:  A Wild Bill Look Under the Shroud of Turin
post:
Twelve minutes??   Does that mean I am supposed to watch this   ??  video twice??
Some folks have said that I may intuitive – for whatever that is worth-  When I first looked at the photo of the image that showed it’s 3 dimensional image, I was struck with the thought that this a  picture of the living Christ.
